name: SpinUp: Original
description:
Spin up to the top of the leaderboards!

◉ Tap screen to move in the direction of the arrow
◉ Hit every platform as you go up
◉ Unlock new themes!


Game Center:
-Global leaderboard
-Post your high score
-Compete with friends

WARNINGS:
-SpinUp is insanely addicting
-Don't SpinUp and drive


How To Play:
-Tap to move in the direction of the arrow on the rotating ball
-Hit every platform before it's too late
-Don't fall behind!



Have any suggestions or questions? Send an email to SpinUpApp@gmail.com and we will get back to you as soon as we can!
